addMarkerMode: When clicking the add button, the map should switch to marker addition mode: a marker should appear at the click location, and a record with the point's address should appear in the list.
addressSearch: You can use any free geocoding API to find the address, e.g., https://geocode.maps.co/.
backendService: Local data storage should be organized as a service emulating a backend. (A Backend class is required to asynchronously save data to localStorage)
centerMap: When clicking on a list item, the map should center on the marker.
createApplication: Using Vuejs, Vuex, VueRouter, Vuetify, create an application. The header of the application should contain a menu with 2 items: About Task and Map. The main part of the application should display the content of the sections.
error: The marker was not added due to an error in retrieving the address.
errorHandling: If the address is not found, an error must be displayed, and the marker should not be added to the list.
mapInstructions: The screen should display a map and a list (see example):
markerHighlight: When clicking on a marker, the corresponding list item should be highlighted.
persistentMarkers: Markers should be stored locally and not disappear after a page reload.
reminderText: the test assignment aims to demonstrate the ability to write good modular code and use the specified technologies. Be proud of this code.
taskText: The section should contain the text of this assignment, styled similarly.
unitTestRequirement: Using jest, write 1 unit test for any component.
urlDisplay: The ID of the selected marker should be displayed in the URL.
